articles.description: Most movie theaters across the U.S. will have free popcorn or discounts on the crunchy snack on Friday, Jan. 19 for National Popcorn Day.
articles.content:
With National Popcorn Day arriving soon, deals on popcorn are popping up at movie theaters across the U.S.
Popcorn, which originated thousands of years ago with the Aztecs among consumers, has been … [+3965 chars]
